data.title: NBCUnicareers
data.meta_description: Working at NBCUniversal We believe in the talent of our people. It's our passion and commitment to excellence that drives NBCU's vast portfolio of brands to succeed. From broadcast and cable networks, news and sports platforms, to film, world-renowned theme parks and a diverse suite of digital properties, we take pride in all that we do and all that we represent. It's what makes us uniquely NBCU. Join us.
data.text:
"I want to make a difference and I am currently in a position where I can do just that as I oversee our coverage of the Paralympic Games. The opportunity to grow that property and how it can impact our whole company in a positive way is such a rewarding part of my job at NBCU."

"The people and culture have made my 6+ year journey at NBCU an awesome experience. I enjoy working with talented, intelligent and passionate people."

"I believe in 'Here you can' because the people live it every day. We create, we collaborate, we laugh, we cry, we sweat, we teach, we learn, we welcome, we accept. I absolutely love everyone I work with every single day, and I can’t imagine myself anywhere else in the world but in NBCU."

"As a Co-Lead of Young Professionals Network (YPN), it is inspiring to work alongside fellow Employee Resource Group leaders who always lead by example while making a significant impact. Since working at NBCU, joining YPN was the best decision I’ve made here."

"Our world-class content - the film IP and franchises we work on, and the filmmakers that have made Universal their home separates NBCU from the rest. Plus, I work with the best of the best in terms of Marketing teams. Being surrounded by my colleagues who consistently perform and are at the top of their game is very inspiring!"
